author: striker
msg: Removed the creation of the private lock in apr_sms_tracking. This lets
this sms start off as single threaded just like the other smss.

author: brane
msg: Adjust the calculated GMT offset on get_offset() for daylight savings time.
This only affects platforms that do not have a tm_gmtoff field in struct tm

author: stoddard
msg: Back out this portion of Bill Rowe's large file support patch.  We should not
use the event handle in the apr_file_t to do overlapped i/o on a socket. We
either need to wait for io completion on the socket or create a thread specific
event handle.  This fixes the seg fault we were seeing when serving a cached

author: striker
msg: Moved the call to apr_sms_assert to within the apr_sms_post_init function.
This will make it more convenient for sms developers.
Added the call to apr_sms_post_init to the 'trivial' sms.

author: striker
msg: Increased the size of the count field. Although it is very unlikely we
ever give out more than 0x10000 fragments from one single block, it seems
Replaced a typecast with a macro.
